columns.name: name
columns.description: The friendly name that identifies the managed instance.

columns.name: id
columns.description: Contains ID to identify a managed instance uniquely.

columns.name: type
columns.description: The resource type of the managed instance.

columns.name: state
columns.description: The state of the managed instance.

columns.name: administrator_login
columns.description: Administrator username for the managed instance.

columns.name: administrator_login_password
columns.description: Administrator password for the managed instance.

columns.name: collation
columns.description: Collation of the managed instance.

columns.name: dns_zone
columns.description: The Dns zone that the managed instance is in.

columns.name: dns_zone_partner
columns.description: The resource id of another managed instance whose DNS zone this managed instance will share after creation.

columns.name: fully_qualified_domain_name
columns.description: The fully qualified domain name of the managed instance.

columns.name: instance_pool_id
columns.description: The Id of the instance pool this managed server belongs to.

columns.name: license_type
columns.description: The license type of the managed instance.

columns.name: maintenance_configuration_id
columns.description: Specifies maintenance configuration id to apply to this managed instance.

columns.name: managed_instance_create_mode
columns.description: Specifies the mode of database creation.

columns.name: minimal_tls_version
columns.description: Minimal TLS version of the managed instance.

columns.name: proxy_override
columns.description: Connection type used for connecting to the instance.

columns.name: public_data_endpoint_enabled
columns.description: Whether or not the public data endpoint is enabled.

columns.name: restore_point_in_time
columns.description: Specifies the point in time of the source database that will be restored to create the new database.

columns.name: source_managed_instance_id
columns.description: The resource identifier of the source managed instance associated with create operation of this instance.

columns.name: storage_size_in_gb
columns.description: The managed instance storage size in GB.

columns.name: subnet_id
columns.description: Subnet resource ID for the managed instance.

columns.name: timezone_id
columns.description: Id of the timezone.

columns.name: v_cores
columns.description: The number of vcores of the managed instance.

columns.name: encryption_protectors
columns.description: The managed instance encryption protectors.

columns.name: identity
columns.description: The azure active directory identity of the managed instance.

columns.name: security_alert_policies
columns.description: The security alert policies of the managed instance.

columns.name: sku
columns.description: Managed instance SKU.

columns.name: vulnerability_assessments
columns.description: The managed instance vulnerability assessments.

columns.name: title
columns.description: ColumnDescriptionTitle

columns.name: tags
columns.description: ColumnDescriptionTags

columns.name: region
columns.description: ColumnDescriptionRegion

columns.name: resource_group
columns.description: ColumnDescriptionResourceGroup
